alert.note: Alert for Lucas; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 04 at 5:39PM EST until March 06 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Cleveland OH has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Ohio... Maumee River At Waterville affecting Lucas and Wood Counties. For the Maumee River...including Grand Rapids, Waterville...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Maumee River At Waterville. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, A few riverside cabins in Waterville become threatened. Lowland flooding occurs along with some water inundation on River Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 PM EST Saturday the stage was 11.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise this evening to a crest of 11.3 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.3 feet on 03/23/1927. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 345 AM EST.
